name: Nebula
description: Nebula is a cutting-edge sports broadcasting platform that delivers live events with interactive viewing experiences, allowing fans to engage in real-time commentary, polls, and social interactions to enhance the excitement of sports entertainment. This innovative platform integrates advanced analytics and user engagement tools to create unforgettable sports experiences, connecting fans worldwide through cutting-edge technology and interactive features that redefine how sports are watched and enjoyed.

name: Codeon
description: Codeon is an innovative app designed for learning programming through interactive tutorials, coding challenges, and personalized learning paths that help users build skills from beginner to advanced levels in various programming languages.

name: Linguix
description: Linguix is an AI-powered language learning app that offers personalized lessons, conversational practice, and immersive experiences to help users master new languages quickly and effectively through adaptive technology.

name: Snap Repair
description: Snap Repair operates a comprehensive network of tech repair service centers specializing in quick and reliable repairs for smartphones, laptops, and other electronic devices, ensuring minimal downtime for customers.

name: Blatota Nax
description: Blatota Nax is a renowned chain of tattoo salons offering custom art designs, professional tattooing services, and a creative space for body art enthusiasts to express their individuality.

name: Kinalia
description: Kinalia features luxury boutiques specializing in high-end clothing, exquisite perfumes, and designer shoes, providing an exclusive shopping experience for fashion-forward individuals seeking premium quality and style.

name: Platera
description: Platera is a diverse network of restaurants offering a wide range of cuisines from around the world, focusing on quality ingredients, innovative dishes, and memorable dining experiences for food lovers.

name: Nixa
description: Nixa is a modern dating app that uses smart matching algorithms and compatibility features to connect people, fostering meaningful relationships through personalized profiles and secure interactions.

name: Vivra Bank
description: Vivra Bank is a digital neobank providing innovative banking and investment services, including mobile banking, investment portfolios, and financial planning tools for modern financial management.

name: Luvry
description: Luvry is an exclusive 18+ boutique offering premium adult products, including toys, lingerie, and wellness items, designed to enhance intimate experiences with quality and discretion.

name: Structara
description: Structara is a leading construction company specializing in sustainable building projects, utilizing eco-friendly materials and innovative techniques to create durable and environmentally responsible structures.

name: Drifta
description: Drifta operates a chain of coffee shops offering specialty brews, artisanal coffee blends, and cozy atmospheres for coffee enthusiasts to enjoy premium beverages and relaxing environments.

name: Mookie
description: Mookie is a network of bakeries dedicated to providing fresh, high-quality pastries, breads, and baked goods made with traditional recipes and the finest ingredients for delightful culinary experiences.

name: Aerava
description: Aerava is an airline offering reliable domestic and international flights with a focus on passenger comfort, safety, and exceptional service to make air travel enjoyable and stress-free.

name: Tivvo
description: Tivvo is a taxi service app providing real-time tracking, easy booking, and safe rides with professional drivers, ensuring convenient and reliable transportation solutions for urban mobility.

name: BRVK
description: BRVK is a chain of barbershops offering professional grooming services, including haircuts, shaves, and styling, in a welcoming environment for men seeking top-quality personal care.

name: Blushé
description: Blushé operates women's salons dedicated to beauty and wellness services, providing facials, massages, and spa treatments in a relaxing setting to promote self-care and rejuvenation.

name: Светлая Память
description: Светлая Память is a compassionate ritual agency providing comprehensive funeral services, including planning, ceremonies, and support to help families honor their loved ones with dignity and care.

name: WebTown
description: WebTown is an internet provider delivering high-speed connectivity solutions, including broadband services and network infrastructure, to keep communities connected and online.

name: SantRobo
description: SantRobo specializes in advanced robotics for industrial applications, offering cutting-edge automation solutions, robotic systems, and AI-driven technologies to optimize manufacturing processes.

name: YW Tech
description: YW Tech develops innovative bioprosthetics and implant technologies, creating advanced medical devices and solutions to improve quality of life for patients through state-of-the-art healthcare innovations.

name: EneCtron
description: EneCtron provides electric transport and charging solutions, including EV infrastructure, battery technologies, and sustainable mobility options to support the transition to green transportation.

name: SkyLib
description: SkyLib offers a secure VPN service for enhanced privacy and unrestricted access, protecting user data and enabling safe browsing across devices with advanced encryption and global servers.

name: Eliza
description: Eliza is an AI assistant designed for productivity and home integration, providing voice commands, smart automation, and personalized assistance to streamline daily tasks and enhance living environments.

name: HMesu
description: HMesu is an innovative art space showcasing heads and paintings, blending classical inspiration with modern creativity to provide unique cultural experiences.

name: Heyya
description: Heyya is a modern advertising agency specializing in digital marketing, branding, and creative campaigns. We develop social media strategies, create engaging content, and manage advertising budgets to achieve maximum efficiency. Heyya helps companies stand out in the market and attract new clients through innovative and data-driven approaches.

name: TransAeroPort
description: TransAeroPort is a leading logistics company specializing in air and port transportation, providing efficient cargo handling, warehousing, and global supply chain solutions to ensure timely delivery of goods worldwide. Our advanced tracking systems and network of partners guarantee secure and cost-effective logistics services for businesses of all sizes.
